overview: Dr. Chickenstein awakens his monster, “The Chicken Man" to participate in a ritual experiment. He uses Tesla's electro-mechanical oscillator and a magic KFC bucket to create a bride for The Chicken Man. After a playful initiation for the deranged Colonel’s amusement, the chickens are left wondering... who will end up on whose plate? [Overview Courtesy of Coney Island Film Festival]
title: The Bride of Chickenstein
